name: kit-qa-fullstack
description: Framework de Automação Full Stack QA: E2E (Playwright + Cucumber), API, Mobile, Acessibilidade (Axe) e Performance (K6) com CI/CD integrado.

scripts.test:extra: npx playwright test tests/e2e/extra/checkout.native.spec.ts && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:mobile && npm run k6:run
scripts.k6:run: bash -c 'npm run k6:up && npm run k6:build && echo "Aguardando Grafana..." && sleep 5 && (command -v explorer.exe >/dev/null && explorer.exe http://localhost:3000/d/fullstack-load-test || xdg-open http://localhost:3000/d/fullstack-load-test || open http://localhost:3000/d/fullstack-load-test || true) && k6 run -e K6_BASE_URL=$K6_BASE_URL tests/k6-load/dist/fullstack.test.js --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/k6'
scripts.k6:ci: npm run k6:build && k6 run -e K6_BASE_URL=$K6_BASE_URL tests/k6-load/dist/fullstack.test.js --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/k6
scripts.ci: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test:api:dev: dotenv -e envs/.env.dev -- npx playwright test tests/api
scripts.test:api:hmg: dotenv -e envs/.env.hmg -- npx playwright test tests/api
scripts.report:generate: cp environment.properties categories.json allure-results/ || true && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:report: npm run test:e2e ; npm run report:generate && npm run report:open

author: Tiago Silva
